name: Project CARS - Old Vs New Car Pack
name_original: Project CARS - Old Vs New Car Pack
description:
Project CARS - Old Vs New Car Pack is a simulation-racing game developed by Slightly Mad Studios. It came out on 27-08-2015. Slightly Mad Studios published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Project CARS - Old Vs New Car Pack on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.
